name: Fieldset
description: Fieldset is a grouping component with the optional content toggle feature.

toggleable.label: toggleable
toggleable.title: When specified, content can toggled by clicking the legend.

collapsed.label: collapsed
collapsed.title: Defines the default visibility state of the content.

toggle-button-props.label: toggleButtonProps
toggle-button-props.title: Used to pass the custom value to read for the AnchorHTMLAttributes inside the component.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

pt-options.label: ptOptions
pt-options.title: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.
